name: Falling Apart (BanCave)
description:
This game was made in only 24 hours for a personal challenge where my theme was "Everything Falls Apart"

Any block that you touch will fall apart and get removed, so be quick!

The controls as W and D to walk, and SPACE to jump.

If you cant go any further, press R to restart.

This game is intended to be something of a "rage game" where if you do the slightest thing wrong, you have to start from the beginning.

I played through the entire game so it should be possible to beat, and if you do beat it, feel free to put your time in the comments!
